title: Hands Down The BEST Response To Sickening Tape Of Milo Advocating Sex With Young Teens…
text:
Go to Article 
Breitbart editor Milo Yiannopoulos was disinvited from the Conservative Political Action Conference after a video of him appearing to speak approvingly of pedophilia came to light. Simon and Schuster has now also dropped Yiannopolous’ book deal. Here’s the video in question.
